## SchemaValidatorCache type

Cache for AJV schema validators

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type SchemaValidatorCache = WeakMap<SchemaObject | ReferenceObject, // First keyed by schema object
Map<string, ajv.ValidateFunction>>;
```
